54 namespace {
55 std::string getProcessId() {
56  char our_hostname[256] = { 0 };
57  gethostname(our_hostname, sizeof(our_hostname) - 1);
58  return std::to_string(getpid()) + "@" + our_hostname;
59 }
60 }
61 
62 class IntrospectionPrivate
63 {
64 public:
65  IntrospectionPrivate(const TaskPrivate* task)
66  : nh_(std::string("~/") + task->id()) // topics + services are advertised in private namespace
67  , task_(task)
68  , process_id_(getProcessId()) {
69  resetMaps();
70  task_description_publisher_ =
71  nh_.advertise<moveit_task_constructor_msgs::TaskDescription>(DESCRIPTION_TOPIC, 1, true);
72  task_statistics_publisher_ =
73  nh_.advertise<moveit_task_constructor_msgs::TaskStatistics>(STATISTICS_TOPIC, 1, true);
74  solution_publisher_ = nh_.advertise<moveit_task_constructor_msgs::Solution>(SOLUTION_TOPIC, 1, true);
75  }
76  void resetMaps() {
77  // reset maps
78  stage_to_id_map_.clear();
79  stage_to_id_map_[task_] = 0; // root is task having ID = 0
80 
81  id_solution_bimap_.clear();
82  }
83 
84  ros::NodeHandle nh_;
86  const TaskPrivate* task_;
87  const std::string process_id_;
88 
90  ros::Publisher task_description_publisher_;
91  ros::Publisher task_statistics_publisher_;
93  ros::Publisher solution_publisher_;
95  ros::ServiceServer get_solution_service_;
96 
98  std::map<const StagePrivate*, moveit_task_constructor_msgs::StageStatistics::_id_type> stage_to_id_map_;
99  boost::bimap<uint32_t, const SolutionBase*> id_solution_bimap_;
100 };
101 
102 Introspection::Introspection(const TaskPrivate* task) : impl(new IntrospectionPrivate(task)) {
103  impl->get_solution_service_ = impl->nh_.advertiseService(GET_SOLUTION_SERVICE, &Introspection::getSolution, this);
104 }
105 
106 Introspection::~Introspection() {
107  delete impl;
108 }
109 
110 void Introspection::publishTaskDescription() {
111  ::moveit_task_constructor_msgs::TaskDescription msg;
112  impl->task_description_publisher_.publish(fillTaskDescription(msg));
113 }
114 
115 void Introspection::publishTaskState() {
116  ::moveit_task_constructor_msgs::TaskStatistics msg;
117  impl->task_statistics_publisher_.publish(fillTaskStatistics(msg));
118 }
119 
120 void Introspection::reset() {
121  // send empty task description message to indicate reset
122  ::moveit_task_constructor_msgs::TaskDescription msg;
123  msg.process_id = impl->process_id_;
124  msg.id = impl->task_->id();
125  impl->task_description_publisher_.publish(msg);
126 
127  impl->resetMaps();
128 }
129 
130 void Introspection::registerSolution(const SolutionBase& s) {
131  solutionId(s);
132 }
133 
134 void Introspection::fillSolution(moveit_task_constructor_msgs::Solution& msg, const SolutionBase& s) {
135  s.fillMessage(msg, this);
136  s.start()->scene()->getPlanningSceneMsg(msg.start_scene);
137 
138  msg.process_id = impl->process_id_;
139  msg.task_id = impl->task_->id();
140 }
141 
142 void Introspection::publishSolution(const SolutionBase& s) {
143  moveit_task_constructor_msgs::Solution msg;
144  fillSolution(msg, s);
145  impl->solution_publisher_.publish(msg);
146 }
147 
148 void Introspection::publishAllSolutions(bool wait) {
149  for (const auto& solution : impl->task_->stages()->solutions()) {
150  publishSolution(*solution);
151 
152  if (wait) {
153  std::cout << "Press <Enter> to continue ..." << std::endl;
154  int ch = getchar();
155  if (ch == 'q' || ch == 'Q')
156  break;
157  }
158  };
159 }
160 
161 const SolutionBase* Introspection::solutionFromId(uint id) const {
162  auto it = impl->id_solution_bimap_.left.find(id);
163  if (it == impl->id_solution_bimap_.left.end())
164  return nullptr;
165  return it->second;
166 }
167 
168 bool Introspection::getSolution(moveit_task_constructor_msgs::GetSolution::Request& req,
169  moveit_task_constructor_msgs::GetSolution::Response& res) {
170  const SolutionBase* solution = solutionFromId(req.solution_id);
171  if (!solution)
172  return false;
173 
174  fillSolution(res.solution, *solution);
175  return true;
176 }
177 
178 uint32_t Introspection::stageId(const Stage* const s) {
179  return impl->stage_to_id_map_.insert(std::make_pair(s->pimpl(), impl->stage_to_id_map_.size())).first->second;
180 }
181 uint32_t Introspection::stageId(const Stage* const s) const {
182  auto it = impl->stage_to_id_map_.find(s->pimpl());
183  if (it == impl->stage_to_id_map_.end())
184  throw std::runtime_error("unregistered stage: " + s->name());
185  return it->second;
186 }
187 
188 uint32_t Introspection::solutionId(const SolutionBase& s) {
189  auto result = impl->id_solution_bimap_.left.insert(std::make_pair(1 + impl->id_solution_bimap_.size(), &s));
190  return result.first->first;
191 }
192 
193 void Introspection::fillStageStatistics(const Stage& stage, moveit_task_constructor_msgs::StageStatistics& s) {
194  // successfull solutions
195  for (const auto& solution : stage.solutions())
196  s.solved.push_back(solutionId(*solution));
197 
198  // failed solution attempts
199  for (const auto& solution : stage.failures())
200  s.failed.push_back(solutionId(*solution));
201 
202  s.total_compute_time = stage.getTotalComputeTime();
203  s.num_failed = stage.numFailures();
204 }
205 
206 moveit_task_constructor_msgs::TaskDescription&
207 Introspection::fillTaskDescription(moveit_task_constructor_msgs::TaskDescription& msg) {
208  ContainerBase::StageCallback stage_processor = [this, &msg](const Stage& stage, unsigned int /*depth*/) -> bool {
209  // this method is called for each child stage of a given parent
210  moveit_task_constructor_msgs::StageDescription desc;
211  desc.id = stageId(&stage);
212  desc.name = stage.name();
213  desc.flags = stage.pimpl()->interfaceFlags();
214 
215  // fill stage properties
216  for (const auto& pair : stage.properties()) {
217  moveit_task_constructor_msgs::Property p;
218  p.name = pair.first;
219  p.description = pair.second.description();
220  p.type = pair.second.typeName();
221  p.value = pair.second.serialize();
222  desc.properties.push_back(p);
223  }
224 
225  auto it = impl->stage_to_id_map_.find(stage.pimpl()->parent()->pimpl());
226  assert(it != impl->stage_to_id_map_.cend());
227  desc.parent_id = it->second;
228 
229  // finally store in msg
230  msg.stages.push_back(std::move(desc));
231  return true;
232  };
233 
234  msg.stages.clear();
235  impl->task_->stages()->traverseRecursively(stage_processor);
236 
237  msg.id = impl->task_->id();
238  msg.process_id = impl->process_id_;
239  return msg;
240 }
241 
242 moveit_task_constructor_msgs::TaskStatistics&
243 Introspection::fillTaskStatistics(moveit_task_constructor_msgs::TaskStatistics& msg) {
244  ContainerBase::StageCallback stage_processor = [this, &msg](const Stage& stage, unsigned int /*depth*/) -> bool {
245  // this method is called for each child stage of a given parent
246  moveit_task_constructor_msgs::StageStatistics stat; // create new Stage msg
247  stat.id = stageId(&stage);
248  fillStageStatistics(stage, stat);
249 
250  // finally store in msg.stages
251  msg.stages.push_back(std::move(stat));
252  return true;
253  };
254 
255  msg.stages.clear();
256  impl->task_->stages()->traverseRecursively(stage_processor);
257 
258  msg.id = impl->task_->id();
259  msg.process_id = impl->process_id_;
260  return msg;
261 }
262 } // namespace task_constructor
263 } // namespace moveit
